om.config.color.deprecationMessage: Color configuration has been deprecated, please use `workbench.colorCustomizations` for configuration. Symbol color configuration: `symbolIcon.*`; Outline color configuration: `outline.*`.
om.config.color.description: Customize the color of specified items.
om.config.region.enabled.description: Enable custom region and tag support. By default, regions start with the tag `#region <name>` and end with the tag `#endregion <name>`. This extension does not perform semantic analysis for specific languages and may recognize content that does not belong to comments as tags.
Whether to register symbol providers for regions and tags.
If set to false, regions and tags will not appear in the built-in symbol list, including the built-in outline view, breadcrumbs, Go to Symbol, etc., but does not affect the Outline Map view.
om.config.region.highlight.description: Enable highlighting of custom regions and tags in the editor..
om.config.region.highlightStyle.descript: Text decoration style for regions and tags definition. For more details, please refer to [DecorationRenderOptions](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#DecorationRenderOptions).
om.config.region.highlightStyle.properti: The text decoration style for the key of the region or tag.
The text decoration style for the name of the region or tag.
The text decoration style for the description of the region or tag.
om.config.region.startRegion.description: Region start tag. The first word after the tag will be used as the region name.
om.config.region.endRegion.description: Region end tag. The first word after the tag will be used as the name of the closing region. If not specified, the last unclosed region will be closed.
om.config.region.tag.description: Tag defining the tag. The first word after the tag will be used as the tag name.
om.config.follow.description: Choose to scroll and expand the outline when the cursor moves or the viewport scrolls. If set to manual, the outline will not expand automatically.
om.config.hiddenItem.description: Choose items to hide in the outline.
om.config.defaultMaxDepth.description: Set the default maximum depth of the outline, set to 0 to not limit.
om.config.customCSS.description: Set custom CSS. CSS will be injected into the outline view.
om.config.workspace.enabled.description: Enable workspace symbol support. By default, regions and tags will be included in the workspace symbol list. Included symbols will only be loaded after opening the file.
om.config.workspace.IncludeSymbols.descr: Choose symbols to include in the workspace symbol list, default is regions and tags.
om.config.workspace.excludes.description: Items to exclude from the workspace symbol list, can specify files, symbol names or files and symbol names. It has a higher priority than `outline-map.workspace.IncludeNames/Symbols`.
om.config.workspace.excludes.item.proper: Exclude by file name, support glob patterns
om.config.workspace.IncludeNames.descrip: Choose symbol names to include in the workspace symbol list. It is recommended to write tags and regions in the code rather than using this setting.
om.config.workspace.fixedFiles.descripti: Specify the number of files to keep at the top of the workspace symbol list. When clicked, files exceeding this value will be sorted to the top. Set to 0 to disable automatic sorting.
om.config.workspace.closeFileTimeout.des: Specify the time to close the file when not clicked (in seconds). Set to 0 to disable timeout closing.
om.cmd.reduceDepth.title: Reduce Depth
om.cmd.addDepth.title: Increase Depth
om.cmd.unpin.title: Unpin
om.cmd.pin.title: Pin
om.cmd.freeze.title: Freeze
om.cmd.toggleSearch.title: Toggle Search
om.cmd.focusSearch.title: Focus Search
om.cmd.workspace.closeFile.title: Close File
om.cmd.workspace.deleteSymbol.title: Exclude This Symbol
om.cmd.workspace.excludeInFolder.title: Exclude In Folder
om.cmd.workspace.excludeGlobally.title: Exclude Globally
om.cmd.workspace.goToLocation.title: Go To Symbol Location
om.colors.outlineMap.visibleRangeBackgro: The color of the visible range in the outline.
om.colors.outlineMap.focusingItemBackgro: The background color of the focusing item in the outline.
om.colors.outlineMap.focusingItemForegro: The color of the focusing item in the outline.
om.colors.symbolIcon.om_RegionForeground: The color of the Outline-Map region symbols in the outline.
om.colors.symbolIcon.om_TagForeground: The color of the Outline-Map tag symbols in the outline.
